headline: Wall Street Gives CrowdStrike 40% Upside While AI Fears Drive the Selloff
summary: With CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD) shares trading down 17% year to date and nearly 25% since its Q3 earnings filing in December, it remains peculiar that retail sentiment on Reddit has still climbed from a quarterly average of 62.5 to a weekly average of 72. headline: 2026 CrowdStrike Global Threat Report: AI Accelerates Adversaries and Reshapes the Attack Surface
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 24, 2026--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today released its 2026 Global Threat Report, revealing that AI is accelerating the adversary and expanding the enterprise attack surface. The average eCrime breakout time fell to just 29 minutes in 2025, with the fastest observed breakout occurring in only 27 seconds. Adversaries are also actively exploiting AI systems themselves, injecting malicious prompts into GenAI tools at more than 90 organizations and abusing AI development pla

headline: IBM posts steepest daily drop since 2000 after Anthropic says AI can modernize COBOL
summary: Shares of International Business Machines recorded their steepest daily drop in more ‌than 25 years on Monday, after AI ‌startup Anthropic said its Claude Code tool could be used ​to modernize a programming language run on IBM systems.  IBM shares sank 13.2%, their biggest drop since October 18, 2000.  COBOL is a programming language widely used ‌on IBM mainframes ⁠across banking, insurance and government systems.

headline: Microsoft Ties Xbox Leadership To AI Cloud And Security Ambitions
summary: Microsoft (NasdaqGS:MSFT) announced a leadership transition in its Gaming division, with Xbox chief Phil Spencer retiring and Asha Sharma taking over. Sharma previously led Microsoft’s CoreAI group, bringing an AI focused background into the gaming business. The company also announced expanded partnerships, including work with CrowdStrike on AI driven cybersecurity and with Ericsson on enterprise 5G integration. For you as an investor looking at Microsoft, this move ties one of its most...
